name: Bolliwood Punch from Slightly Oliver
description: Rum, orange, cardamom, make for a citrusy, sweet punch from Slightly Oliver in NYC.
recipeIngredient: Pinch of ground cardamom (plus more to taste)
Garnish: orange, lemon, and lime slices

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the rum, brandy, orange juice, lime juice, simple syrup, rosemary, Angostura, and a pinch of cardamom in a punch bowl or very large pitcher. Taste and add more cardamom if desired. Garnish with slices of orange, lemon, and lime.
